ObjectClass.Name: Hydra (Sepiligo)
ObjectClass.Description:
HYDRA/SEPILIGO: Heavy biological air supremacy platform Rate-of-fire depends on Weapon Energy Energy drains while moving Extremely vulnerable when not energized Otherwise, devastating vs other aircraft Effective in groups vs ground
Can progenerate base Octo and Pharo pair

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: Move to specified location\ \Movement drains Weapon Energy \Move Speed: 12 (aircraft)\Vision Range: 28, Aggro Radius: 35

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location \Fire-rate increases at W-Energy 20, 30 \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs ]\Gnd: 45 (30, 15), R 22, Sta S\Air: 150 (100, 50), R 22, Sta S

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Change Commander
Objective.Details: Set an Arcticus as commander or set\target's Arcticus as own commander

Objective.Name: Remove from Heirarchy
Objective.Details: Remove from command hierarchy\ \Disconnect from commander

Objective.Name: Lead group
Objective.Details: \Take lead of everyone that\reports to this unit's Arcticus

Objective.Name: Gestate Octopod
Objective.Details: Biological main ground-assault armor\Mobile anti-ground heavy sniper\Progenerates advanced units\Morphs into Ghost

Objective.Name: Gestate Cthulhu/Octoligo
Objective.Details: Biological heavy-support armor\Provides high-impact swarm supression\Devastating vs infantry and grouped aircraft\Can progenerate base Sepi and Pharo pair\Can Nanite Infect (req. Specials tech)

Objective.Name: Meiotic Progenesis/Gestation
Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires the Loligo Tech upgrade

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to location in time\ \Must not have a TSS\Recharges Shields 50%

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Not Available\Must upgrade Chronoporting\in Reaph building

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ Must be near a Teleporter

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to location in time\ \Must not have a TSS\Recharges Shields 50%
